TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase

summary.span: 序列化对象图的一系列 CodeDOM 语句。

span.span: Serializes an object graph to a series of CodeDOM statements.

summary.span: 此类用于序列化程序提供一个抽象基类。

span.span: This class provides an abstract base class for a serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以实现一个自定义用于控制类型的组件在设计时组件初始化代码的生成。You can implement a custom to control the generation of component initialization code for a type of component at design time. 若要实现一个自定义对于类型，您必须：To implement a custom for a type, you must: 1. 定义一个从 派生的类。Define a class that derives from . 2. 实现序列化或反序列化方法的方法重写。Implement method overrides for serialization or deserialization methods. （请参阅下面有关详细信息的信息。）(See the information below for details.) 3. 将您的自定义相关联实现，使用一种类型的组件使用。Associate your custom implementation with a type of component using a . 若要实现生成的组件的配置代码的序列化方法：To implement a serialization method for generating configuration code for a component: 1. 在派生类中、 重写适当的序列化或反序列化的类的基类的方法。Within a class that derives from , override an appropriate serialization or deserialization method of the base class. 2. 如果你想要生成代码语句执行的默认组件配置的默认序列化程序，必须获取并调用基序列化程序组件。If you want the default serializer to generate code statements that perform the default component configuration, you must obtain and call the base serializer for the component. 若要获取该组件的基本序列化程序，请调用方法的传递给方法重写。To obtain the base serializer for the component, call the method of the passed to your method override. 传递方法要序列化的配置，以及序列化程序的请求时，它是基类型的组件类型。Pass the method the type of the component to serialize the configuration of, along with the base type of serializer you are requesting, which is . 对基本序列化程序，使用调用将替代具有相同名称的方法和对象传递给方法的重写。Call the method of the same name you are overriding on the base serializer, using the and object passed to your method override. 如果要实现方法，基本序列化程序的方法将返回一个对象。If you are implementing the method, the method of the base serializer will return an object. 此对象的类型取决于具体取决于要序列化的值的组件的类型的基序列化程序的类型。The type of this object depends on the type of base serializer which depends on the type of component you are serializing the values of. 如果要实现， ，或方法，必须创建一个新包含生成的代码语句中，并将其传递给方法。If you are implementing the , , or method, you must create a new to contain the generated code statements, and pass it to the method. 3. 如果您调用了一个基本序列化程序方法，则必须，其中包含要生成以初始化该组件的语句。If you have called a base serializer method, you will have a that contains the statements to generate to initialize the component. 否则您应创建。Otherwise you should create a . 您可以添加对象表示要与此集合的组件配置代码中生成语句。You can add objects representing statements to generate in the component configuration code to this collection. 4. 返回，表示要生成配置组件的源代码。Return the that represents the source code to generate to configure the component. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义的 CodeDOM 序列化派生。The following code example illustrates how to create a custom CodeDOM serializer that derives from . [!code-cpp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CPP/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CS/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/VB/idesignerserializationmanagersample.vb#1)]

para.span: 当从 继承时，必须重写下面的成员： 和 。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: and .

related.span: 动态源代码生成和编译

span.span: Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用序列化管理器来创建对象并解析数据类型。This method uses the serialization manager to create objects and resolve data types. 返回对象图的根。The root of the object graph is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等效于调用，只不过它返回一个对象实例，如果生成的语句变量赋值语句、 具有初始化表达式或字段赋值语句的变量声明。The is equivalent of calling , except that it returns an object instance if the resulting statement was a variable assign statement, a variable declaration with an init expression, or a field assignment statement.

protected: System::CodeDom::CodeExpression ^ SerializeToReferenceExpression(System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::IDesignerSerializationManager ^ manager, System::Object ^ value);
member this.SerializeToReferenceExpression : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager * obj -> System.CodeDom.CodeExpression

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This method has been deprecated. Use SerializeToExpression or GetExpression instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

param.name: manager
param.span: 要在序列化过程中使用的序列化管理器。

span.span: The serialization manager to use during serialization.

param.name: value
param.span: 要序列化的对象。

span.span: The object to serialize.

summary.span: 序列化为 CodeDOM 表达式指定的值。

span.span: Serializes the specified value to a CodeDOM expression.
The serialized value.

returns.span: 这将返回如果没有引用的表达式可以获取指定值或值不能序列化。

span.span: This returns if no reference expression can be obtained for the specified value, or the value cannot be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是类似于，只不过它将停止如果它无法获取值的简单引用表达式。This method is similar to , except that it stops if it cannot obtain a simple reference expression for the value. 预期结果的表达式用作参数或语句的目标时调用此方法。Call this method when you expect the resulting expression to be used as a parameter or target of a statement.
